alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 2:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, northeastern Bay, northwestern Calhoun, south central Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 215 PM CDT... At 143 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vernon, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bonifay, Bradford, Alford, Wausau, Brock Crossroad, Betts, Orange Hill, Ridgetop, Gilberts Mill, Center Lake, Round Lake, Smyrna, Spring Hollow, Sunny Hills, Poplar Head, Compass Lake, Sylvania and Johnson Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
